## translate-extensions package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ExternalTranslationLoader](./translate-extensions.externaltranslationloader.md) | External translation loader, that can be configured with multiple resources |
|  [ExternalTranslationLoaderOptions](./translate-extensions.externaltranslationloaderoptions.md) | Options that are used within ExternalTranslationLoader |
|  [NgxTranslateStringLocalizationService](./translate-extensions.ngxtranslatestringlocalizationservice.md) | Implementation of StringLocalization, which uses ngxTranslate as localization engine |

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [translateString(key, translateService, translateCallback, interpolateParamsGet)](./translate-extensions.translatestring.md) | Performs translation of key(s) and calls callback, also listens for language changes |
